    • Method Detail

      • incoming

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.io.InputStream> incoming(@Nonnull
                                                                                        Request request)
        On incoming message from Viber, handles the message asynchronously.

        This method returns a ListenableFuture with InputStream an promise. The returned InputStream should be used as a response to the incoming request from Viber. An InputStream is not guaranteed to be returned, and may be null. The url argument must specify an absolute Request. The name argument is a specifier that is relative to the url argument.

        Parameters:
        request - the Request object
        Returns:
        a future with nullable InputStream.
        See Also:
        Request

      • setWebhook

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<ApiResponse> setWebhook(@Nonnull
                                                                                  java.lang.String url)
        Sends an set webhook request to Viber The url must start with HTTPS, and must have valid ssl certificate.
        Parameters:
        url - the url to register as webhook
        Returns:
        a future with ApiResponse that may throw ApiException.
        See Also:
        ApiResponse, ApiException

      • sendMessage

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> sendMessage(@Nonnull
                                                                                                              UserProfile to,
                                                                                                              @Nonnull
                                                                                                              java.util.Collection<Message> messages)
        Sends messages in order to Viber user (via UserProfile).

        This method ensures messages are sent in the order they are received. It will discard all keyboard in all messages expect the last message.

        Parameters:
        to - UserProfile
        messages - collection of Message
        Returns:
        future which contains a collection of message tokens as strings, that may throw ApiException.
        See Also:
        Message, UserProfile, ApiException

      • sendMessage

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> sendMessage(@Nonnull
                                                                                                              UserProfile to,
                                                                                                              @Nonnull
                                                                                                              Message... messages)
        Sends one or more messages to a Viber user. Shorthand for sendMessage(UserProfile, Collection)
        Parameters:
        to - UserProfile to send messages to
        messages - one or more messages to send
        Returns:
        future which contains a collection of message tokens as strings, that may throw ApiException.
        See Also:
        sendMessage(UserProfile, Collection)

      • onMessageReceived

        public void onMessageReceived(@Nonnull
                              OnMessageReceived listener)
        Registers a callback for event Event.MESSAGE_RECEIVED. The listener will be called upon incoming(Request) of that event.
        Parameters:
        listener - an OnMessageReceived listener
        See Also:
        OnMessageReceived

      • onMessageSent

        public void onMessageSent(@Nonnull
                          OnMessageSent listener)
        Registers a callback for event Event.MESSAGE_SENT. The listener will be called when sendMessage(com.viber.bot.profile.UserProfile, java.util.Collection<com.viber.bot.message.Message>) successfully sends a message.
        Parameters:
        listener - an OnMessageSent listener
        See Also:
        OnMessageSent

      • onTextMessage

        public void onTextMessage(@Nonnull
                          java.util.regex.Pattern pattern,
                          @Nonnull
                          OnMessageReceived listener)
        Registers a callback for a regular expression TextMessage. When a TextMessage arrives, will call listeners with matching pattern sequentially Call ordering is not gurenteed.
        Parameters:
        pattern - Pattern
        listener - an OnMessageReceived listener
        See Also:
        OnMessageReceived
